specstable:
Manufacturer Newport
Model 850-1
Description Motorized Linear Actuator
Other Information

Tested

Travel: 25 mm
Length: 208 mm
Resolution: 1 Micron
Speed: 40-400 Microns
Compatible with Model 850, 855, PMC100*, PMC200*, PMC400* controllers.

* Require 850IA-10 9 pin to 15 pin adapter cable, available upon request

Condition Very Good
